quotes.text: Discipline beats motivation every day
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Work hard in silence, let success make noise
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.text: Built by students, for students
quotes.author: Sudhir Kumar

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Your limitationâ€”it's only your imagination
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream it. Wish it. Do it
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn't just find you. You have to go out and get it
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Do something today that your future self will thank you for
quotes.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

quotes.text: Little things make big days
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Dream bigger. Do bigger
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong
quotes.author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them
quotes.author: Unknown
